item.description: Structure Fire - Now Out; INC#0138; 03:01AM; 5341 W Romaine St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Xwn3UE; #EastHollywood; Thirty firefighters responded to the site of a two-story duplex with fire in the lower unit. It took 16 minutes to extinguish the flames (3:17am), confining the damage to the unit-of-origin. The upstairs unit was able to remain occupied after the fire, but three adults will be displaced from the ground-floor unit (fire unit), and American Red Cross was notified to support them. No reported injuries. Cause under investigation.; FS 52; Batt 5; West Bureau; Council District 13; BC5 E227 E235 E27 E52 E82 RA52 RA82 T27 T35; CH7; 13; Nicholas Prange

KNOCKDOWN Structure Fire; INC#0895; 01:40PM; 11301 N Woodcock Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H47QmU; #Pacoima; It took 18 firefighters 14 minutes to extinguish the fire inside an attached garage converted to a living space. Firefighters were in contact with the residents and confirmed everyone made it out safely prior to LAFD arrival. No reported injuries. The cause is under investigation.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E287 E298 E7 E75 E91 RA81 RA98 T87 T98; CH8; 17; Nicholas Prange

Structure Fire; INC#0895; 01:26PM; 11301 N Woodcock Av; MAP: https://bit.ly/3H47QmU; #Pacoima; One-story single-family home with moderate smoke showing (from attached garage?). Offensive mode.; FS 98; Batt 12; Valley Bureau; Council District 7; BC12 E287 E298 E7 E75 E91 RA81 RA98 T87 T98; CH9; 17; Nicholas Prange

Fatality Structure Fire; INC#0295; 06:21AM; 17063 W Knapp St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3WEhqCQ; #Northridge; PRELIM: 26 Firefighters took just 13 minutes (6:34 AM) to access, confine and fully extinguish a contents fire within the attached garage conversion at a 3,191 square-foot one story single family home. During fire attack, they found a lifeless adult male within the garage conversion. Beyond medical help, he was determined dead, and remains at the scene. No other injuries reported. Fire cause under active investigation. No further details. ; FS 87; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; BC15 E103 E287 E290 E70 RA87 T87 T90; CH9; 17; Brian Humphrey

Traffic Collision with Entrapment; INC#1661; 11:14PM; 2942 E Whittier Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J8PcNo; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Two vehicle collision, with a total of four patients, including one briefly trapped in the wreckage. Three are in critical condition, one has minor injuries. Media Inquiries: LAPD Central Traffic Division (Incident #4256).; FS 25; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E202 E25 EM1 HR3 RA17 RA2 RA25 RA814 T2; CH7; 14; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire Now Out; INC#1594; 10:15PM; 104 S Orange Dr; MAP: https://bit.ly/3iSOUQ3; #HancockPark; 38 Firefighters took just 27 minutes (10:42 PM) to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a two-story residential duplex. The well coordinated efforts of LAFD crews prevented intense flames from damaging two adjacent homes. One resident with minor injury declined care. The American Red Cross will be assisting 8 of the 9 adults displaced by the fire, which heavily damaged the structure. The cause of the blaze remains under investigation.; FS 61; Batt 18; South Bureau; Council District 5; BC18 E227 E229 E261 E27 E29 E41 RA41 RA61 T27 T29 T61; CH7; 13 14; Brian Humphrey

Hiker Rescue; INC#0877; 02:35PM; Santa Susana Mountains; MAP: https://bit.ly/3J5yxdq; #GranadaHills; PRELIM: LAFD ground and air response to a remote trail within O'Melveny Park, where a 70 year-old female hiker sustained a non-life threatening ankle injury in a ground level fall. An LAFD Flight Paramedic has been lowered from a hovering LAFD Rescue Helicopter, and is medically stabilizing the patient, preparing her to soon be hoisted into the hovering helicopter, where she will be provided in-flight care during direct transport to an area hospital. No further details.; FS 18; Batt 15; Valley Bureau; Council District 12; AO1 AO2 BC12 BC15 E18 E287 H2 H4 HA2 HA4 RA18 RH114 T87; CH8; 18; Brian Humphrey

Fatality Traffic Collision; INC#0342; 07:03AM; NB 110 Fwy south of Redondo Beach Bl; MAP: https://bit.ly/3wk8TtR; #HarborGateway; PRELIM: Solo vehicle off freeway embankment. One person (unknown age / gender) found trapped and determined deceased in vehicle. No other injuries reported. Media Inquiries: CHP South LA (Log #698) and Coroner.; FS 79; Batt 6; South Bureau; Council District 15; E264 E79 RA79 T64; CH4; Brian Humphrey

Knockdown Structure Fire; INC#0313; 06:43AM; 1324 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Hosxey; #BoyleHeights; 22 LAFD responders took just 30 minutes in a largely defensive firefight to access, confine and fully extinguish heavy fire within a vacant 45' x 50' one-story former fast-food restaurant, the site of a previous fire. No injuries. No other structures damaged. Fire cause under investigation. ; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E202 E25 RA17 T2; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey

Structure Fire; INC#0313; 06:13AM; 1324 S Soto St; MAP: https://bit.ly/3Hosxey; #BoyleHeights; PRELIM: Defensive firefighting operations against heavy fire showing from a vacant 45' x 50' one-story commercial building (former fast-food restaurant), the site of a previous fire.; FS 17; Batt 1; Central Bureau; Council District 14; BC1 E17 E2 E202 E25 RA17 T2; CH9; 13; Brian Humphrey
